sen.e: His brother, Kanzaburo NARUISHI (February 5, 1880 - January 3, 1931) who engaged in the sales business of general merchandise, was also arrested for Kotoku Incident, (also known as Taigyaku Jiken (High Treason Incident)) although his death sentence was reduced to a life imprisonment after the trial, and later he received conditional release in 1929.
